import {Card, Button, Table} from "react-bootstrap"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Profile = (props) => { const [name, setName] = useState(localStorage.getItem("name")); const [email, setEmail] = useState(props.currentUser); const navigate = useNavigate return Profile
Name
{name}
Email
{email}
} export default Profile;
